name: huggyllama/llama-30b
description: This contains the weights for the LLaMA-30b model. This model is under a non-commercial license (see the LICENSE file). You should only use this repository if you have been granted access to the model by filling out this form but either lost your copy of the weights or got some trouble converting them to the Transformers format.

promptExamples.title: Write an email from bullet list
promptExamples.prompt:
As a restaurant owner, write a professional email to the supplier to get these products every week: 

- Wine (x10)
- Eggs (x24)
- Bread (x12)

promptExamples.title: Code a snake game
promptExamples.prompt: Code a basic snake game in python, give explanations for each step.

promptExamples.title: Assist in a task
promptExamples.prompt: How do I make a delicious lemon cheesecake?
